chat_history.message:
Hello,

My Galaxy S21 5G is experiencing the following problem:
The USB-C port does not work: impossible to charge the device with a cable, no connection possible with wired earphones. 
Network issue: my S21 device captures very poorly on the network!!! My SIM card works perfectly on another phone that I access well to the 4G network in the same location!!

Thank you for your help,

Once received, the seller has 3 working days (5 if it's a laptop or household appliance) to replace or repair your product. Or, 2 working days to process its refund (if you're eligible).
A return is considered complete when the customer confirms that:
✔ The product has not been repaired by a third party and has not suffered any damage due to a fall or exposure to water
✔ The suppression of personal data has been carried out
✔ They have confirmed having the return label
✔ They understand they must include accessories as well as a proof of purchase in their package
✔ They have 14 days to use the return label.

Reminder: once received, the seller has 3 working days (5 if it's a laptop or household appliance) to replace or repair your product. Or, 2 working days to process its refund (if you're eligible).

Dear Backcare,

We have processed the refund. Thank you for your understanding and cooperation.

Regards,
KW
